title: KREMA ZA ROKE CARE&PROTECT 3 IN 1, NIVEA, 75ML

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Myristyl Myristate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Tapioca Starch, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum.
